src.sql: IF EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 [State] FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_SpecificUpdates WHERE [State] = 'Critical' AND Product = '[TknParams:ProductID]' ) BEGIN SELECT 'Critical' END ELSE IF EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 [State] FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_SpecificUpdates WHERE [State] = 'Recommended' AND Product = '[TknParams:ProductID]' ) BEGIN SELECT 'Recommended' END ELSE BEGIN SELECT [State] FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Hotfixes WHERE Id = '[TknParams:HotfixID]' END
